news.title: Bullion Hegemony: Gold @ $5,045
news.summary: Prices stabilized above $5k as U.S. Inflation Expectations (3.1%) fell short of consensus.

news.title: BoE x Chainlink RWA Pilot
news.summary: Bank of England confirms RWA tokenization testing on public-adjacent rails.

macro.insight: Maintaining a robust 2.8% Global GDP forecast for 2026. AI-led productivity is raising the growth floor.

metals.insight: Revised terminal target for Gold to $6,000 citing 'Fiscal Shock' scenario.
Gold's risk premium is currently 50% overextended. Mean-reversion risk toward $4,800.

crypto.insight: Maintains $150,000 BTC price target for 2026 citing institutional ETF absorption floor.

social_intelligence.insight: Social volume for '$XAU' reached a 30-day peak as price crossed $5,000. Sentiment is heavily skewed long, historically preceding a liquidity sweep.
Mention of 'Flash Crash' has declined by 40% in the last 24h. Community focus shifting toward 'Warsh Nomination' as a positive catalyst.
